content: to 3 stsbefore the end ssp p1 short row 9 rs k1 ssk work chart 2 to 6 6 7 7 8 stsbefore the m pm w&t short row 10 ws p to 3 stsbefore the end ssp p1 short row 11 rs k1 ssk work chart 2 to 5 6 6 7 8 stsbefore the m pm w&t short row 12 ws p to 3 stsbefore the end ssp p1 short row 13 rs k1 ssk work chart 2 to 5 6 6 7 7 stsbefore the m pm w&t short row 14 ws p to 3 stsbefore the end ssp p1 short row 15 rs close short row work chart 2 to end and close the w&tstitches total 45 49 53 57 62 sts 6 through the leaves put left front piece 45 49 53 57 62 ststo working needles hold left front piece and left back piece together rs facing seam together using 3- needles-cast-off method neck ribbing using 3 5mm needles start from left top of neck hole pick up sts pick up 1 stevery row when encounter front/ back center st remove stitch holder and k1 mark stitch total pick up even number sts join and work in round put bor marker rnd1 work 1*1 ribbing to 1 stbefore the front center st s2kpo work 1*1 ribbing to 1 stsbefore the back center st s2kpo work 1*1 ribbing to bor 4 stsdecreased bor beginning of the round rnd2~4 repeat rnd1 k knit cast off k2tog knit 2 stitches together m marker p purl sleeves ribbing *2 p2tog purl 2 stitches together pm place marker using 3 5mm needles r&t for short row rap and turn round round start from bottom of arm hole pick up sts rs right side pick up 3 stsevery 4 row s2kpo slip 2 stitches together knit-wise total pick up even number sts knit next stitch pass slipped stitch over 2 stsdecreased center ston top join and work in round put bor marker ssk slipe1 stitch knit-wise slipe1 stitch knit-wise knit 2 stitches together through work 1*1 ribbing until the ribbing measures the back loop 4cm/1 6 ssp slipe1 stitch knit-wise slipe1 stitch knit-wise purl 2 stitches together through cast off the back loop st st stockinette knit on rs purl on ws sts stitches ws wrong side sep 2022 7 chart 1 left front key k in rs p in ws 1/1 lc 1/1 rc repeat * 1/1 lc/rc more details on p9 repeat xl xxl s m l where the chart starts for different sizes chart 2 right front charts are read from bottom to top right to left if encounter only 1 stsof 1/1 lc/rc at the beginning or ending sts please knit 1 instead l m s xxl xl repeat 8 where the chart ends for different sizes chart 3 back l m s xxl xl repeat xl xxl s m l 1/1 lc method 1 slip 1 stto cable needle hold at front knit 1 knit
